page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES IN BUNNY
page.content: These are the games we play in the school playground. The most popular game is called{Wall.}You run to the wall and the last person to touch it is on. They have to try and tig{touch anyone who runs across the playground. When they're all tug{touched,}someone shouts "wall" again and the game is repeated.{Tiggy Scarecrow}is another game where the person who is on tigs the others. If you get tug you stand as a scarecrow and somebody who isn't on has to go through your legs with out being tug to free you.{Hot Rice}is a game with a ball. You have two on and they throw a ball at the others. If it hits them below the knee they are on and the game carries on until everyone is hit with the ball. The girls play two kinds of skipping, one with a long rope and one with a loop of elastic called{French skipping.
